price: Dan Nūḥ berkata, "Naiklah kamu sekalian ke dalamnya dengan menyebut nama Allah pada waktu berlayar dan berlabuhnya".  Sesungguhnya Tuhan-ku benar-benar Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang.
arabic: ۞ وَقَالَ ٱرۡكَبُواْ فِيهَا بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ مَجۡر۪ىٰهَا وَمُرۡسَىٰهَآۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqāla ir'kabū fīhā bis'mi al-lahi majrahā wamur'sāhā inna rabbī laghafūrun raḥīmun
